article.title: GD to Operate and Maintain C4 Systems in Korea
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: General Dynamics Information Technology Incorporated, Herndon, Virginia, was awarded a $16,443,478 firm-fixed-price contract for the services necessary to perform command, control, communications and computer information systems operations and maintenance for the 1st Signal Brigade throughout the Korean peninsula. The 411th Contracting Support Brigade, Services Division, Korea, is the contracting activity.
